modName: LustDesign - Sovngarde Steel Armor v2 DSR Patch
summary: A patch to make the sword and shield of the armour mod to work with Dual Sheath Redux. Swords can be seen at the back with left side mesh added.Works together with shield and weapon on back.Compatible with HDT Equipment too!
descriptionHtml:
Original Mod Page: [size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16096/?]LustDesign - Sovngarde Steel Armor v2 - CBBE_UNP_CHSBHC_ADEC[/url][/size]
DSR: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34155/?]Dual Sheath Redux[/url]

Sorry i didn't include the armor/cuirrass in the screenshots because its a feamle armor mod but weapons can be used by any gender, im kinda male nordic player but that doesnt matter.
Install with any mod manager, Delete the your old DSR patch then Rerun Java Procer/Patcher to add the new patch/mesh so you can see you weapons at your back alongside with your shield, you can only equip shield and sword at RIGHT position/side at back of your character ,Left side doesnt work because DSR is limited at those kind of feature.

Enjoy!

Forgive my English, Im Asian.:)
Thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/2392895/?]Tearoth[/url] for the request and also for the screenshots i used for this MOD. i hope you like my patch :)
author: Jeffhubert113
